content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences, but there are many good all-purpose fertilizers available that can work well for tulips. Look for a fertilizer labeled for use on bulbs, as these products typically contain the proper balance of nutrients, such as a high phosphorus level for promoting flowering. Some popular fertilizer choices include bone meal, fish emulsion, and granular bulb fertilizers. Remember to follow the package instructions carefully and avoid over-fertilizing, as this can damage the plant.
